FuncDef:
The traffic policy command configures a traffic policy.
The undo traffic policy command deletes a traffic policy. The traffic policy command configures a traffic policy. The undo traffic policy command deletes a traffic policy. By default, no IFIT traffic policy is configured. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a traffic policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo: Before configuring IFIT, you can run this command to configure an IFIT traffic policy. A traffic policy can be bound to a traffic classifier or a traffic behavior. The traffic policy can be applied to an interface or globally, and the number and priority of flows created based on the traffic policy can be specified.
